import{useSelector}from'react-redux';export const useSelectFavoriteMovies=()=>useSelector(state=>state.favoritesStoreReducer.favoriteMoviesid);export const useIsFavorite=movieId=>{const favoriteMovies=useSelectFavoriteMovies();// console.log('favoriteMovies in useIsFavorite', favoriteMovies);
return favoriteMovies.includes(movieId);};
